channel.title: Homepage on Join MX Player
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Join MX Player

item.title: Nimish Garg
item.description: Seeing the impact of features i envisage on the users at scale, gives me joy!

item.title: iOS Developer
item.description: Financial accounting (or financial accountancy) is the field of accounting concerned with the summary, analysis and reporting of financial transactions related to a business. Objectives Financial accounting and financial reporting are often used as synonyms. According to International Financial Reporting Standards: the objective of financial reporting is: To provide financial information that is useful to existing and potential investors, lenders and other creditors in making decisions about providing resources to the reporting entity.

item.title: iOS Developer
item.description: As an iOS developer at MX, you would work on the team that owns the development and maintenance of the MX Player Video Streaming app and the MX TakaTak Short Videos app. Responsibilities As a developer in our iOS team you would be responsible for the following duties. Design and code features for the native iOS applications. Write unit tests for all features. Ship features in fast moving agile sprints.

item.description: Attention to detail and focus on quality is what helps me do well at my job at MX. Being able to ship features to millions customers is a satisfying experience.

item.title: About
item.description: MX Player is the world’s best video player, and now it’s one of India’s largest streaming platforms. Watch your favourite TV Shows, MX Original Series, Web Shows, Movies, Sports, Music Videos, Live TV Channels, International Shows and much more for free. Enjoy everything in entertainment now in one app. #Everytainment
